name: Car Constructor
description:
Car Constructor will allow you to build, repair and paint your own car, then check it out on the race track! This game offers you a lot of tools for repairing and improving the car, a shop with a wide selection of spare parts, various types of paint and tuning, as well as a realistic mountain track and various types of road surface.

Main Features


  • Deep upgrade system of the car. You can replace almost any part
  • Detailed ride physics
  • Realistic graphics, big race track
  • A real car enthusiast's garage!
